name: About:Home - Blue Shelby Mustang/Ford
description: Love your mustangs? well you might just like this one ;)

user.name: WarOnCrime
user.about:
IF you wish for a special wallpaper that you would like with this type of look and you can't do it yourself for whatever reason...then feel free to message me the URL to the picture...I'll have it up in no time
  And If you have any problems with my CSS let me know...It's been a while since I learned CSS but I'll give your problem a shot

additional_info:
Feel free to do with as you wish...copyrights are crap 
The Truth is that there have been more downloads of my Shelby Wallpaper than the others this past week or so...so i decided to make some more to give options instead of just one...I hope you enjoy...
